subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: If these Mets, alias the Hairless Wonders now that virtually all their scalps have been sheared like sheep, were to win the World Series, they would deserve to be remembered for their shiny skulls.
snippet: If these Mets, alias the Hairless Wonders now that virtually all their scalps have been sheared like sheep, were to win the World Series, they would deserve to be remembered for their shiny skulls.
